scripts.install:codesandbox: yarn install && yarn run install:codesandbox:components && yarn run install:codesandbox:tokens
scripts.build:codesandbox:components: cd design-components && yarn run add:components && yarn bootstrap && yarn run:build && cd ..
scripts.build:codesandbox: yarn run build:codesandbox:components && yarn run build:codesandbox:tokens
scripts.build:components: cd design-components && yarn && yarn run add:components && yarn bootstrap && yarn run:build && cd ..
scripts.build:tokens: cd design-tokens && yarn && yarn build && cd ..
scripts.build: yarn run build:components && yarn run build:tokens
scripts.test:components: cd design-components && yarn run test && cd ..
scripts.eslint:components: cd design-components && yarn run lint && cd ..
scripts.stylelint:components: cd design-components && yarn run stylelint && cd ..
scripts.ci:publish:package: lerna changed && lerna publish from-package --conventional-commits --create-release github --yes --no-verify-access --message 'chore(release): publish from package'
scripts.publish:package: lerna changed && lerna publish $RELEASETYPE --conventional-commits --create-release github --yes --no-verify-access --message "chore(release): publish $RELEASETYPE version"
scripts.lint: yarn eslint && yarn stylelint && yarn prettier:write
